SALESFORCE HELP

REBATE MANAGEMENT
Orchestrate Rebate Payout Calculations

Automate the rebate calculation process with configurable predefined flows. Schedule the flows at regular intervals. Use predefined flow actions to customize the rebate process as required. Configure an end-to-end orchestration flow to manage the rebate lifecycle. Use Batch Management capabilities to process a large number of filtered and aggregated transaction records in manageable chunks.

How Are Rebate Payouts Calculated?
Review the necessary steps to calculate rebate payouts for the members in a rebate program. Transaction Journal records are used as the input for calculation, and the output is stored in Rebate Member Payout records.
Flow Templates with Rebate Management
Rebate Management comes with Flow templates that help orchestrate rebate calculations. You can configure and use them for your end-to-end rebate calculations and extend the templates as required. The flows trigger the data processing engine definitions to update the aggregate records, and also trigger calculation processes to update the final payout amounts. Admins can schedule the flows at regular intervals.
Clone and Activate the Predefined Flow Definitions
It’s recommended you clone the Flow Builder templates readily available with Rebate Management. When you clone a template, the cloned template can be customized and then activated for rebate processing. You can also choose to create a flow from scratch, and add the required flow actions and data processing engine definitions to it.
Predefined Flow Actions with Rebate Management
Use flows to automate the processes of calculating rebates for members during a payout period. The members must be active and enrolled in an active rebate program. The rebate types and associated benefits must also be active. Admins can use predefined flow actions to extend the flow templates available with Rebate Management, or while creating a flow from scratch. Find the required flow actions in the Rebates category in Flow Builder.
Additional Learning Resources for Flow Builder
Check out these resources to learn how to best use Flow Builder.
Process Transactions with Batch Management
Use Batch Management capabilities to process a large number of filtered and aggregated transactions in manageable batches, and calculate rebate amounts. Use the configurable Batch Management framework to modify the predefined batch definition, or create your own.
Predefined Batch Management Jobs with Rebate Management
Rebate Management flows use Batch Management capabilities to process a large number of filtered and aggregated transactions to calculate rebate amounts. There are two predefined batch jobs Calculate Rebate Payout and Calculate Rebate payout for All Periods that are available with Rebate Management and can be used in any scheduled flow.
Additional Learning Resources for Batch Management
Check out these resources to learn more about Batch Management.
